mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, George Washington Parke Custis to John Augustine Washington III, 1847 December 17
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Custis, George Washington Parke, 1781-1857
mdRecord.dcterms:description: George Washington Parke Custis writes to John Augustine Washington III with concerns about finalizing the settlement of the estate of George Washington including the sale of land near the Dismal Swamp in Nansemond County. Autograph letter signed, 2 pages, with integral address label.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Washington, George, 1732-1799 -- Estate
Dismal Swamp (N.C. and Va.)
